name: Rage Simulator
description:
Rage Simulator is a somewhat difficult platformer game. Play as a red character and reach the end of the level as fast as you can !

The project was inspired by French youtuber "Nico", who made a series of rage platformers called "Rage Simulator" / "Rage Xtrem". He unfortunately stopped uploading in september 2019.

Features:

  • Classic platformer obstacles, like moving platforms, spikes, cannons, ...
  • No unfun obstacles (invisible spikes, platforms that you fall through, ...)
  • Some original obstacles
  • Many different movement mechanics: learn to "low jump", air strafe, ...
  • Try to obtain the best time !

Controls :

  • WASD to move (or ZQSD in ver 1.1)
  • Mouse to look around
  • Spacebar to jump / double jump

Credits:

  • Programming and art assets by me
  • Sounds and music from Freesound.org (see relevant credit section in game)
  • Made with Unity

1.1 Changelog:

  • Can now use ZQSD to move around
  • Added Post Process Toggle

This game was made within a week in mid 2022.
